public vendors

this has d2 vendor responses that don't require OAuth, but may be a little late or old.

you may be looking for:
  • titan.json
  • hunter.json
  • warlock.json
  • all.json


updates at reset/every 4 hours, it's shaped like a normal API all vendors call, but with 3 extra keys at the top level 
{
  // changes to true if a vendor pull failed (i.e. API is down)
  "oldData": false,
  // if github actions is down or super slow, or my computer died,
  // updating "oldData" to true might be delayed or fail.
  // checking this date might be a more reliable indicator of data staleness
  "bestBefore": "2022-11-01T13:00:00.000Z",
  // obvious
  "dateGenerated": "2022-11-01T12:03:50.756Z",
  "Response": {
  // etc. usual keys here. "vendors" "sales" etc
